name: Toystroyer
description:
our Game

Toystroyer is a new combination of 3D top down shooter and toy setting. This action packed shooter is based on games like Hypercharged Unboxed and Bounty of One.

The Story

This game is about how a kid got his favorite figure for christmas, which is the main hero that the player will play. The player is placed in a toy world that reflects an old playing carpet. It is important to mention that you only have a 10-minute time limit.

Your Mission

The goal is to fight your way through the different areas of the playing carpet and defeat waves of opponents that are scattered around the world in order to generate points. These points can be used to unlock new areas, objects and status improvements.

As soon as the player has cleared all Main Quests, the game is finished. 

If you want to prove your skills, head into Arena mode!

✔ Actionpacked

✔ Nostalgia

✔ Simple and Rewarding

✔ Time Challenging Core Gameplay
